content.new:
I am using Gazebo from default branch. If you try to start it with:
~~~
GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH="" gazebo
~~~
it loads correctly. 

However if you try to set `GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH` to a meaningful variable, for example to load some world file in a giv
